title: User authentication
description: The system shall authenticate users using unique credentials
rationale: Ensure secure access to the system
acceptance_criteria: User can log in with valid credentials

title: Performance response time
description: The system shall respond in less than 200 ms for standard requests
acceptance_criteria: Average response time measured under load < 200 ms

title: Database technology
description: The system shall use PostgreSQL as the database engine

title: Export user data
description: The system could allow users to export their data in CSV format
acceptance_criteria: User can download a CSV export
